content.rendered:
The professional credential for green building

As the gold standard in green building certifications, LEED is a standout. Take your career to the next level with LEED professional credentials. Administered through the USGBC, LEED credentials demonstrate your proficiency in today’s sustainable design, construction and operations standards.

For those just starting out, the LEED Green Associate signifies your core competency in green building principles, and provides value on any green building project. CAGBC offers courses designed to help you prepare for the LEED GA exam. Learn more about our kickstarters.

Green building professionals actively working on projects should look to LEED AP with specialty, an advanced professional credential signifying expertise in green building and a LEED rating system.

For more information or to book an exam, visit USGBC.

Learn more
